level.heading: NOTICE TO TENANTS OF HOUSING CODE PROVISIONS (§ 14-300)

level.text: The owner of each habitation shall provide to each existing tenant, and shall at the commencement of any tenancy provide to the tenant, a copy of the provisions of this chapter and a copy of the following sections of chapter 1 of this subtitle:

level.heading: AUTHORITY Unless otherwise noted, the authority for this chapter is contained at paragraphs 28 and 46 of section 7 of An Act Making appropriations to provide for the expenses of the government of the District of Columbia for the fiscal year ending June thirtieth, nineteen hundred and three, and for other purposes (“Act of 1902”), Public, No.218, 32 Stat. 590, approved July 1, 1902, as amended by:
level.text: An Act approved July 1, 1932 to amend section 7 [of the Act of 1902], Public, No. 237, 47 Stat. 550; and An Act approved July 22, 1947, Public Law 215, 61 Stat. 402.

level.heading: SOURCE
level.text: The Housing Regulations of the District of Columbia, 5G DCRR § 2904, Commissioners’ Order 55-1503 (August 11, 1955).
